resources.string: Do you want to return to den Start Screen?
You can\'t sign up at the moment!
You can\'t sign in at the moment!
The game has not startet yet
Your password was NOT accepted by the server. Please try again or contact the support.
Your email was NOT accepted by the server. Please try again or contact the support.
Email can be used to sign in at wack-a-doo.com or to retrieve a new password
Provide an email to be used in password retrieval, and to recive ingame events.
Your character is presently locked to this particular device!
You have these options to make your character "portable"
The present user will be lost in case you sign out now. To be able to access this user again, make it portable.
Restored access to your account %s. If this is not the account you wanted to restore, please contact support.
There was no account that could be restored. Please contact support.
The password must consist of at least 6 characters
Lost access to your Wack-A-Doo account

I've lost access to my account [PLEASE INSERT YOUR ACCOUNT NAME HERE].
Could you please help?

Vendor Token:
Device Token: 
App Version: 
(the above information will help us to find your account)
You have %d Credits. Buy more to help your tribe prosper.
Purchases will be credited to the user \'%s\'.
Buy Credits and purchase Comfortfunctions and Accellerators
Get some credits to improve your game experience

With 5D Platinum Credits you can unlock the Platinum Account and the production bonus.

You can trade Platinum Credits for Golden Frogs.

 With Golden Frogs you can finish building tasks, speed up the recruitment of units or trade with the traveling merchant.
Come on, get some Golden Frogs and give me an army!

Trade your Platinum Credits for Golden Frogs to finish building tasks, to speed up the recruitment of units or to trade with the traveling merchant.

15 Golden Frogs cost only 8 Platinum Credits.

 50 Golden Frogs cost only 24 Platinum Credits.

120 Golden Frogs cost only 47 Platinum Credits.
What you are waiting for? With a Platinum Account, we will be able to expand our power even more.

Construction Queue: having a Platinum Account increases your available construction queue by three slots. Construction jobs are processed even when you're not logged into the game, provided that you have enough resources to finish the work.

 Training Loop: Your training queue increases by three slots when you have a Platinum Account, which means you will have the opportunity to accept further training contracts in the same training construction, after the first contract is over.

 Combat notification by email: With an enabled Platinum Account you will be immediately notified by email of attacks on your colonies, fortresses or armies, even when you are not active in the game. So even when you are not currently playing, you can immediately react to your opponents. You can send for further armies to assist you or ask your alliance for help.
More Resources? Everyone needs more resources!

The production bonus is valid across your total production of the chosen resource.

15% global production bonus for fur production.

15% global production bonus for stone production.

15% global production bonus for wood production.

Contributors: Anand, Jan-Niklas Bartholomäus, Max Buck, Christian Seidel, Matteo Bottin, David Canela, Patrick Fox, Maggie Jaglo, Jan Hendrik Kegel, Sascha Lange, Stefan Mattern, Thomas Mohr, Arno Möller, Christiane Lange, Hai Pham, Pikomi, Hajo Runne, Julian Schmid, Susan Tackenberg, Christian Wansart, Jupp Wegner, Marcel Wiegand
